resources.string: Reset pw e-mail couldn\'t sent; Check if e-mail address is valid!
Warning: Check if you have an active internet connection!
\nYou are joining the community, go on like that.
\nIt seems like some of the users remember you.
\nWith a quick glance We can tell that you are getting popular in the community
\nYou are one of the most popular community members, every player knows you
You didn\'t gain any Upvotes for your comments until now. Keep up the good work!
After 5000 points you can add a quote here!
You can suggest a question to us. We will review it in time. Until that; the suggestion is editable and removable.
Own comment is not votable but removable
Your comment will be deleted, Are you sure?
Come on mate you passed this stage before!
get the obvious stuff out of the way
Reading comments now will sacrifice the points you will gain from this question, Are you sure?
You need an active internet connection to play Q Space. We synchronize your progress and status simultaneously.
Hello %1$s. \n Q Space is a math based game which inspired from iq tests.\n
Mission: Q Space aims to entertain while solving some math based iq tests.\n
Vision: Q Space; in the long run, as an interactive game, targets drawing attention to the abstract thought basics with a wide profile community, step by step.\n

"What can i do?"
 - First; you can enjoy the stages.
 - You can comment to the stages to share your perspective. So some questions may have different solutions to the same answer.
 - You can upvote the useful comments
 - You can suggest a question to the Q Space!
 - With the steps above, you can get points 
 *to gain some extra features
 *to jump up to a new moon or planet
 *You may even find some secrets…

Have Fun!

"How can i see the comments or write one to the stages?"
 - In every stage there is a button on the right bottom. But you have to find the right answer or give up from the points to see them.
 

 "How to upvote a comment?"
 - By long pressing(touching) to the specific comment. Just a note you can't upvote your own comment
 

 "How to undo my upvote?"
 - Same with upvoting; by long pressing(touching) to the comment that upvoted before. (Green number at the bottom right corner of the comment means you upvoted the comment before)
 

 "How to see another player's profile summary?"
 - Double pressing(touching) to the comment will pop up a window that contains the summary of the player.
 

 "How to delete my comment?"
 - By long pressing(touching) to your own comment.
 

 "How to edit my comment?"
 - If you wrote a comment to any stage's comment page but didn't leave the current page, writing a new comment will replace your last comment. But if you left that page before you can't edit your comment.
 

 "Why should i comment?"
 - If your comment gets an upvote you will gain some points.
 

 "Is the game ok for kids?"
 - Sure, therefore; we didn't add P.M. and subcomment functions to the game?
 

 "What is that ufo in the main menu?"
 - Ask yourself!
 

 "How may i know if my question suggest reviewed?"
 - You will see an empty text area when you opened the "Suggest_Q" page.
 

 "When will you add my suggested question?"
 - If it is approved, it would be added to the queue. So it will be published when it is time.
 

 "How may i know if it's approved?"
 - We will mail you to inform.
 

 "Stage scoring procedure?"
 - Answer as fast as you can.
